# Whitelist of expected simulator error patterns (one regex per line).
# Lines starting with # are comments. Blank lines are ignored.
# Each line is matched as a bash regex against the full error log line.
# Example:
#   failed to push status
#   device-[0-9]+: Syncing status: failed

write file /etc/motd: operation not permitted
Failed to list systemd jobs: systemctl list-jobs: context canceled
